code: import{toast}from'react-toastify';export var toastError=function toastError(message){if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.error(message);}};export var toastWarning=function toastWarning(message){if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.warn(message);}};export var toastInfo=function toastInfo(message){if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.info(message);}};export var toastSuccess=function toastSuccess(message){if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.success(message);}};
